name: Dragon Ball Z: Buu's Fury
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Buu's Fury is an action RPG released in America on September 14, 2004, for the Game Boy Advance. It is the sequel to Atari's best-selling Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II and the third and final video game in the Legacy of Goku series, even though it did not bear the series name on the product packaging, unlike the last two.

The game follows the Majin Buu Saga, starting at episode 195 and ending at episode 291. The player starts in the Other World Saga and ends at the Peaceful World Saga.
